title: Galaxy Z Fold 4 tipped to use upgraded ultra-thin glass for improved durability
content:
Samsung has been making progress with its foldable phones over the past couple of generations, but it still faces issues with durability among other things. According to a new report, Samsung will debut a stronger version of its ultra-thin glass on the Galaxy Z Fold 4.

moreâ€¦

The post Galaxy Z Fold 4 tipped to use upgraded ultra-thin glass for improved durability appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: To improve durability further, Samsung is reportedly working on a new generation of its ultra-thin glass for the Galaxy Z Fold 4.
